38888576.review:
這是一款極具巧思、富有創意的益智拼圖遊戲，遊戲帶領我們進入Eon的孤獨世界。

Eon是一個被困在時間和世界裡的旅行者，當我們拼湊出完整的拼圖時，看到的是孤獨的Eon，獨自一人在世界裡游走，搭配輕柔的鋼琴配樂，更能進入安靜且悲傷的世界裡。

遊戲模式很像七巧板，從一開始的移動拼圖，到翻轉、翻折、瞬移及放大縮小的方式，按照必要的順序拼在一起；每次過關後都能看到一段Eon的小畫面，每個畫面細細品嘗，都能深刻感受的迷失在宇宙間的Eon的內心世界。

遊戲難度不算高，遊戲會循序漸進的出現各種拼湊方式，但個人覺得如果本身有玩過益智遊戲的人，會比較容易上手。

遊戲畫面非常舒服，雖然廣大的世界裡只有孤獨的Eon，但是透過簡單的筆觸，呈現給我的們是孤獨的美。

遊戲推薦度？很便宜的小遊戲，拿來打發時間是不錯的，破關畫面甚至都可以拿來當桌布使用了，總之，收藏吧！

Le jeux vaut vraiment le coup pour tous les amateurs de puzzle !

解谜过程不难，约莫1.5h就能通关，掉卡，通关全成就，适合挂卡党，全成就党以及休闲党。

画风：这是一款有很好艺术风格的休闲拼图游戏，蕴含70幅类似纪念碑谷风格的插画，插画质量上乘，甚至直接能作为各pc主题方案了。

音乐：游戏BGM即使作为ost单独贩售也不过分。（倒不如说我想要一份）

在故事上，说实话即使快速通关在从头至尾的看了解锁的插画--依然不知所云
只能说从画风上看讲的应该是一个孤独的故事吧（笑。感染力还是相当强的，在游戏中间感觉挺抑郁的，主人公只身一人在世界游走，世界太大，人太小。。或许是我不适合这类风格的游戏也不一定（笑
以下引用评论区大神对本故事的解读（涉及剧透）：
	[spoiler][quote=author] 在我看来这个故事大概是一个关于在宇宙间的孤独的旅行者的故事，旅行者从一扇大门前出发，门上有三把锁，于是他出发，去寻找门的钥匙。在忧伤之月之上的星空之塔中，他找到了第一把钥匙“镜像”；在寒冷的冰川上，有一座漂浮在空中的城堡，在那里他找到了第二把钥匙“传送”；在最后的仙人掌绿洲上，他找到了最后一把钥匙“旋转”。漫长的旅程终于结束，在经过了同样漫长的回程以后，他重新站在了门的前面。然而当他通过门的时候，前方的路开始变得黑暗，模糊不清。这时候，又有个小人点燃了自己，变成了太阳，变成了光，于是他便可以继续前进。然而前进又能去哪里呢？大概就是另一段旅途的开始了吧。[/quote]	[/spoiler]

単純なパッズルと単純なUI。なのにどうして惹かれてしまうのだろう。


パッズル（原文ママ）に関しては単調なものが続いていく。
分量も少なすぎず、多すぎず、値段相応と言ったところ。
パズルゲーとして見るには可もなく不可もなく。

しかし、このゲームはパッズルであってパズルではないのだ。
作中には文字も無ければキャラクターについての情報も何もない。
ゲームについての説明もなければ、操作方法すらも表示されない。
ただ数十枚のCGで綴られるストーリーは何の情報も与えられないがゆえに美しく、どこか寂しく感じられる。
ところどころCGと連動した仕掛けを見せるパッズル。
華を添えるBGM。
これら全てがマッチして没入感を与える。

プレイの際にはフルスクリーンで、画質は最大まで上げてプレイすることを強くおすすめする。
[spoiler]ていうか時ノ旅ビトだこれ[/spoiler]

38371222.review:
Итак,что же такое Zenge?
- Zenge это занимательная головоломка, повествующая историю Эона — одинокого путешественника, который застрял во времени и между мирами. 
- Zenge это интересная игра в которой игрокам предстоит собирать виртуальный пазл.
Плюсы:
- Маленькая стоимость игры
- Приятный саундтрек
- Прекрасная атмосфера
- Продуманный Gameplay
- Красивая графика
- Наличие достижений Steam
- Возможность легко получит 100% достижений
- Большое количество карточек
- Увеличивающийся уровень сложности
- Шикарные картинки
- Большое количество уровней
- Игра развивает логику
- Минималистичный дизайн
- Очень красивая история
Минусы:
- Игра слишком лёгкая
- Не поддерживает планшетный ввод на ПК,хотя игра и разрабатывалась под тач-девайсы
Вывод:игра замечательно подходит для тех кто любит решать головоломки!

38340969.review:
首先，这个游戏对于我这种图形废来说，还是挺难的……虽然一众测评都表示哎呀小学生难度，洒洒水啦，然而看我花了将近4小时才通关就知道了……不过普通人2小时出头应该够吧。
游戏和七巧板的玩法挺类似的，通过旋转，翻折，放大缩小等方法将碎片化的图案按照一定的要求拼合在一起就可以通关，轻柔的音乐，其实应该挺轻松的难度让这款小游戏特别适合在休闲的时候玩，打折的时候入（emm，忘记原价了，游戏是我朋友送的）是很适合的。而且最后拼出来的图形也有点微妙的意思，总而言之，作为一款独立的小游戏，它非常值得你收藏。

只看游戏玩法的朋友看到这里就可以了，下面涉及剧透，然而这款游戏居然也有剧透？你是在说攻略吗orz？其实不是的。刚才说到，每一关拼出来的图形都有点意思——也就是每张图都是有实际的意义的，但是这个故事太过晦涩难懂，我这里也只是说说自己的理解，一千个读者有一千个哈雷彗星，哦不对是哈姆雷特，有不同的理解是很正常的。我也希望大家在玩的时候，可以尝试感受一下这个故事的内容。如果直接讲重点的话，我想引用一句网上的评价：
一种模糊不清的忧伤和美好弥散了出去，又凝结为守候与坚持，像是清晨时守望朝阳的街灯。
在我看来这个故事大概是一个关于在宇宙间的孤独的旅行者的故事，旅行者从一扇大门前出发，门上有三把锁，于是他出发，去寻找门的钥匙。在忧伤之月之上的星空之塔中，他找到了第一把钥匙“镜像”；在寒冷的冰川上，有一座漂浮在空中的城堡，在那里他找到了第二把钥匙“传送”；在最后的仙人掌绿洲上，他找到了最后一把钥匙“旋转”。漫长的旅程终于结束，在经过了同样漫长的回程以后，他重新站在了门的前面。然而当他通过门的时候，前方的路开始变得黑暗，模糊不清。这时候，又有个小人点燃了自己，变成了太阳，变成了光，于是他便可以继续前进。然而前进又能去哪里呢？大概就是另一段旅途的开始了吧。

确实是很晦涩的故事，我的理解也不一定正确。但是有一点是不会有错的：这是一段孤独的旅程。再想想，人生也是这样的旅程，有些人可以一直陪伴你，有些人只能在关键时候出现，有些人只能默默守候你，而有些人，则只有擦肩而过的缘分。

得，写完回头一看，认真的测评就几句，后面的全是梦话（笑）。

38070633.review:
Relax & Arte. Devo aggiungere altro?
Sì.
Il gioco è una sequenza di puzzle, di difficoltà sempre crescente e sempre impegnativi, ma mai illogici o incomprensibili.  La ricompensa per il completamento di questi puzzle saranno delle meravigliose illustrazioni che immagine dopo immagine ci racconteranno una storia che, nonostante la totale assenza di descrizioni o dialoghi, riuscirà ad appasionarci e a farci domandare cosa succederà nella successiva.
Le suddette illustrazioni sono incantevoli e riusciranno a ipnotizzare anche il più insensibile degli sguardi, mentre la colonna sonora è rilassante e struggente al tempo stesso, quasi ai livelli di To The Moon.
Infine, il prezzo base è di 0,99€.
Ma insomma, di che cazzo stiamo parlando?
COMPRALO!

37954663.review:
가장 처음 얻었던 스팀 게임.
흩어져 있는 퍼즐 조각들을 움직이고, 돌리고, 뒤집고, 축소시키고, 다시 원상태로 키우고, 포탈로 이동시켜서 제 자리로 찾아가게 만들면 되는 퍼즐 게임입니다.
모든 조각들이 원 상태로 돌아가서 퍼즐이 맞춰지면, 그림들이 하나씩 완성됩니다.
그리고 그 그림들은 하나로 이어져, 하나의 스토리가 됩니다.
이런 식으로 천천히 퍼즐을 맞춰 가면서 플레이를 진행해주시면 됩니다.
가볍게 즐기기 좋은 게임으로, 플레이 시간은 넉넉잡아 2시간 이내, 혹은 그 이상입니다.
잔잔한 음악과 멋진 그림을 감상하시면서 게임을 즐겨주시면 됩니다.
플레이 타임이 조금 짧아서, 이게 다야? 하고 생각하실 수도 있습니다.
드롭되는 트레이딩 카드를 모아 총 5단계의 뱃지도 제작 가능합니다.

다만 아쉬운 점이 있다면, 한 개의 퍼즐이 끝나면 나오는 그림들을 다시 감상하기가 힘들다는 점입니다.
그림들을 다시 보려고 그 그림이 있는 퍼즐에 들어가면, 다시 퍼즐을 맞춰야 그 그림을 감상할 수 있습니다.
스토리를 보지 않고 퍼즐만 즐기셔도 상관은 없습니다.
스크린 샷을 찍어서 일일히 보는 방법도 있지만, [strike] 솔직히 귀찮아 하실 거 다 압니다. [/strike]
이와 같은 문제로 인하여 스토리 이해에 문제가 될 수 있습니다.

그동안 모바일과 컴퓨터로 퍼즐 게임을 하면서 이렇게까지 힐링 받으면서 한 퍼즐 게임은 처음이었습니다.
가격도 저렴하고, 플레이타임도 괜찮고 전체적으로 나쁘지 않으니 한 번쯤은 플레이 해 보시는 걸 추천드립니다.

37945638.review:
Zenge was relaxing and entertaining, although not very mentally tasking.

Puzzles are rewarding and combine elements together. This helps to keep things interesting while also making the final set a real test of skill. Most puzzles are pretty easy to figure out and require no head-scratching as there is usually one or two possible ways to move things. Just focusing on how to get a piece from A to B while editing your plan in case of obstacles is something you’ll learn after a few moments of pre-puzzle confusion create by an influx of information.

The little pictures you get from each puzzle are cute and have a great artstyle that ties that game’s feel together. The images kind of have a plot between them although it’s hard to pay attention enough to remember the characteristics of the previous panel in between 2-5 minute puzzles, so I got mostly lost with the story. A lot of the images are really gorgeous though, might have to track a few down for desktop backgrounds. :3

The soundtrack is pleasant but there are only around 6 tracks in it so after a half an hour it gets a hair repetitive. The jingle sound effect for a completed puzzle or the cut of version (which sounds janky) for a piece in the right place is a bit cheesy but both the sound effect and music can be disabled if it’s bothering you.

Zenge contains a lot of clicking and dragging so playing a mobile version might make for a better experience. Coupled with the fact that it’s shorter play time burns away on PC, which is a stationary platform, buying a mobile version might create a more paced out experience that isn’t inclined towards binging.

Zenge is a bargon and worth a moment of your time, whether you’d rather take it on the go or add it to your steam collections for that added 100% and trading cards.

37937348.review:
[i]Zenge[/i] is a moderately challenging puzzle game that offers about two hours of decent fun to complete its 70 puzzles. At the price of 99 cents (even less when on sale) it's a no-brainer: if you're at all into puzzle games, you shouldn't hesitate and give [i]Zenge[/i] a try.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]

The goal is to slide the pieces of each puzzle across the lines into their target slots. It starts out very straightforward but every dozen or so levels, the game adds a new mechanic. These mechanics allow and require you to rotate, mirror, teleport, shrink or enlarge pieces, or use certain pieces as a switch to activate color coded lines, allowing other pieces to cross those lines.

Every time a new mechanic is introduced, the difficulty drops for one or two puzzles, serving as a tutorial to familiarize the player with the new mechanic. After that, the difficulty rises steadily until the next mechanic comes along. Overall, [i]Zenge[/i] isn't very difficult at all but you do need to think some of the puzzles through or experiment a bit before the solution will come to you. For me, and I assume for most people looking for a challenge but not to the point of frustration or migraine, [i]Zenge[/i]'s difficulty is nearly perfect for a casual puzzle game.

[h1]Graphics and sound[/h1]

For a game that has a minimalist look, [i]Zenge[/i]'s graphics are certainly easy on the eye. When you complete a puzzle, you're shown an artwork in the same minimalist style as the puzzles' design. These are artworks that you probably wouldn't hang on your wall but they're nice to look at for a couple of seconds before you click the button to start the next puzzle. 

The music is very basic. You hear a simple but atmospheric melody being played on the guitar or the piano. The sound effects are equally basic, consisting of little else than a very soft 'woosh' sound when you slide a puzzle piece across a line. 

If you like, you can disable the music or the sound effects from the game's menu, which is again very basic. There is a third button that allows you to switch between the current puzzle and the level select screen, and that's it. There isn't even a 'Quit' button, you just press Esc on your keyboard to close the program.

[h1]On Steam's extra features[/h1]

[i]Zenge[/i] has 6 Steam Trading Cards. You'll get 3 while running the game.

There is only one Steam Achievement to be had, an achievement that unlocks after completing the last puzzle.

37732057.review:
There are other minimalist puzzle games out there for around the same price which offer a much better and more enjoyable experience while being of the common minimalist style.

This is a port of the mobile version and it shows.It's a good port but it is a little bit better on mobile as it was deisgned for swipping and clicking and draggin.Im just nitpicking here.

While being a minimalist puzzle game, it does not feel like one.The soundtrack isn't what you would expect and the style, sounds, and art add to that.It tries to be like a traditional minimalist puzzle game but also doesn't.It's like a chinese knockoff of one.

The music while done well gives off a "nauseous" feeling (to me atleast) and is not all that pleasent to listen to and it does build up at times instead of staying relaxing all of the time.

The puzzles are just annoying.The game even tells you what to do by adding overlays and telling you what goes where.
The variety is alright but i've seen way better in other games that are like this.
The difficulty never really builds up.
If you had the knowledge of the puzzle types you could complete the last level or any under 5 minutes and that's a somewhat long amount of time for this.
Sure the game does say it's relaxing but 2.7 hours (in my case) is a bit too long for that.
And if it was shorter it wouldn't be worth the money as you could find games similar to this for free on websites.
You can and will solve puzzles very early into the level that you are one and then it will become only a matter of time before you complete them.
Also sometimes it can be a little clunky at times when you are dragging as the game wants you to stop at certain spots on a line because they are different.
The puzzles are also not very well designed. 
At times you will be able to avoid what are supposed to be key elements of the puzzle.
There are only so many things in each level and the game never tricks out the player.

The art and story does not add much to this.You get a frame of art for every level you complee and can only see all of them after you complete the game.Another nitpick.

I think it would be best for you to browse around steam for a little while and get some other puzzle game as you can get much better games for the same price.Unless you really like cards or getting perfect games.Otherwise do look for something better

37573305.review:
Great cheap puzzle game. The mechanics are introduced simply, then complicated, then blended together to make every stage feel both fair and satisfying. The mechanics are interesting enough to carry the whole game, which runs about an hour and a half to 2 hours.

The background story is serviceable; abstract symbols in minimalist landscapes, geometric shapes creating characters and objects in space backgrounds. It's vague notion of a journey fits the feel of the game's mechanics, even if the narrative itself isn't actually constructed. But with the excellent music and color palettes, these story flashes do a fine job just adding to the ambience. Sound design also conveys a lot of information clearly while not interfering with the general mood of the game.

Played it a second time a few months after beating it the first time. Just as satisfying, even if the puzzles are the same.
Absolutely worth full price

[i]Zen.. enge? Ge? Revenge? Zen something.[/i] Zenge is a simple puzzle game where you are tasked with matching the missing pieces of a picture by manipulating said missing pieces along pre-set paths. It's a mostly chill experience, I found many of the puzzles by the numbers and often the only difficulty was created by a single innocuous piece that had to be placed at a specific point in the sequence. 

[h1]Good[/h1]
-nice casual puzzle game 
-the games "beautiful" art is okish

[h1]Bad[/h1]
-many of the puzzles are way too simple 

I had a bit of fun with zenge and I think I'll probably finish it just to see where the story goes. Would be better played on a touchscreen and could do with less filler puzzles but yeah it's OK [h1]3/5[/h1]

36282688.review:
总共玩了两个小时，把这个游戏通关了，[spoiler] 简直逼死颜值控+强迫症 [/spoiler]，游戏的优秀程度让我忍不住写点什么，于是就有了我的第一篇评测

这个游戏的画风让我想起了《纪念碑谷》，都是一样的精致，让人更加享受玩的过程。[spoiler] 随随便便截张图都是超级美的壁纸啊！我这种强迫症一定要每张都截下来啊！怎么可能好好的玩！ [/spoiler] 但如果仅仅是这样，反而不像游戏，更像在[strike] 用PPT[/strike]讲故事。因此，游戏的可玩性就会略显不够。思路上是个创意，把简单的拼图变得不简单，加入了平移、旋转、镜面、映射、改变大小等多种玩法，使得拼图更具趣味性，但仍然有一定的单调，玩下去需要一定的耐心[spoiler]和智商[/spoiler]。
从[b]价格[b]上来说，游戏还是非常值得购买的

最后，前面也说了，这更像一个故事，但让我忍不住吐槽的是[spoiler]难道是我的理解能力太差了吗？这个故事我没看懂啊！到底说了点什么？那个小人到底是要做什么？追寻什么奇奇怪怪的信仰吗？  [/spoiler]

36270167.review:
이 게임은 퍼즐 게임이 아닙니다. 퍼즐 게임이라고 생각하고 이 게임을 하면 진짜 재미가 없습니다. 퍼즐 난이도가 서서히 올라가는 것도 아니고(오히려 상당수는 아무 생각 없이 해 보다 보면 풀리고, 더 이상 진행이 불가능한 상태가 되는 경우도 거의 없습니다. 딱 한 번 있었습니다), 퍼즐이 조금만 어려워질 만하면 새 요소가 나와서 난이도가 리셋됩니다. 성취감도 뭣도 느껴지지 않습니다.

하지만 아름다운 그림과 음악을 감상하는 거라면 이 정도는 감수할 수 있죠. 게임이 꼭 재밌어야 하는가, 도전적이어야 하는가라는 질문에 아니오라고 답하면서 제시할 수 있는 게임입니다.

The mechanic of the puzzles changes in some points to give some variety.

36090883.review:
Zenge to kolejna minimalistyczna i ciesząca oko łamigłówka od Michała Pawłowskiego.
Natomiast różni się ona znacznie od innych produkcji tego twórcy, takich jak PUSH, klocki, czy Hook.
Zenge posiada wątek fabularny, który poznajemy w miarę układania puzzli, które tworzą następne ujęcie z przygody naszego bohatera. Fabuła jednak nie jest ściśle nakreślona i może być interpretowana na wiele sposobów.

Ogółem Zenge to godna polecenia gra na maks. 3-4h.

36012262.review:
I'm not recommending the game because it no longer gets dev support.  If there's a problem you're on your own.  But I will review the game incase that doesn't bother you.

Make sure you get it on sale if you buy it.  The game itself is just a quick jigsaw puzzler with a twist.  You can finish it rather quickly and won't really need help as they are very complex.  I enjoyed it, but it wasn't the best by far.  The game lacks in proper development.  There's no real menu or quit this game option.  It seemed a bit lazy.  There are problems with the steam card drops and achievements for some.  I can't get the cards to drop at all.  That's really all there is to it.  You'll forget the game 5 minutes after you're finished and replaying it is okay but not satisfying.  The only thing that stood out for me was that after you do a puzzle you get a nice little picture and some of them are nice to look at but it really doesn't follow a story or anything else.  I guess it could for some.  Mostly I just clicked on the next button as soon as I could and rarely looked at them, but one or two were nice enough to get me to go back and look at before continuing on again.

Listen dude. You make good games. I played your Hook game before and I loved it. But you can't remake the same thing and call it a new game. This game basically has an identical mechanic to Hook. But let's face it, it's basically a jigsaw with order. There is a limited number of way you could do anything, and after setting down the mechanics, building puzzles would be super easy. Like easy enough you could make the game have steam workshop and let people design their own levels! 

So... I'm only voting you down because I know you can do better. This is a down vote of confidence. ;) 
Looking forward to the next ones.

35173354.review:
Dans Zenge, il s'agit de réaliser successivement 70 puzzles pour reconstituer à chaque fois une forme qui va dévoiler une jolie image.

La prise en main est parfaitement intuitive et c'est pourquoi aucun indication explicite n'est fournie.
Il faut simplement faire glisser les pièces sur des rails pour les déplacer, user de mécanismes qui permettent de les faire pivoter ou de modifier leur taille ou enfin actionner des interrupteurs.

Le jeu se complexifie en douceur et les mécanismes se renouvellement progressivement. Le tout accompagné  d'une délicieuse musique zen. Sans oublier de dire que les images sont sont très agréables à contempler.


Un seul regret, l'aventure ne dure pas plus de 2h mais vu le mini prix, l'expérience mérite d'être tentée sans hésitation.

Wow.  I had no idea what to expect when I launched this game because I use a random steam game picker website.  I immediately noticed the wonderful soundtrack, very calming and gentle.  Started playing the game, and it's a puzzle game.  Okay, pretty simple, kind of like tangrams mixed with slider-puzzles where you have to move pieces around and avoid collision along the way.  Simple concept, the music really put me into a puzzling mood and I dove in.  Did a few easy tutorial puzzles, then I started to notice what I was putting together.  After every puzzle completion you get rewarded with a scene from an adventure with a little dood in some surreal world.  I'm motivated to continue because I want to experience the story.  All the while the music is tremendously soothing.  Decide to alt-tab and check the store page.  It has overwhelming reviews, I agree.  And then I see the price 99 cents!  For that money, based upon my half hour spent puzzling, I can already tell you that it is absolutely worth it.

Recommend to puzzlers
Recommend to anyone who is having a super crappy day, the zen qualities are amazing

34688313.review:
An absolutely charming little slide puzzle. It's clean, simplistic, beautiful and requires no manual or tutorial to play.
New mechanics are gradually introduced, and every new mechanic is introduced with a level specifically designed to show you how to use it. This is level design at its best. You won't find any text at all in the game because none is needed.

The game is realtively short. If you like puzzle games like this one, you'll finish all the levels in under two hours. However, don't let that put you off buying Zenge. It may not have hundreds of levels, but the ones it does have are worth every single cent several times over. In fact, if the game was five times the price, I would still recommend it just as warmly, and it would still be extremely good value for your money.

Отличный пример того, как два человека могут сделать хорошую игру. Не нужно быть мастером, что бы сделать приятный глазу и слуху продукт. Не нужно оркестра, что бы сыграть приятную музыку. Не нужно буйство красок, что бы показать понятную сцену. Сложный сюжет тоже не особо нужен.

34096132.review:
Zenge is like a picture book that requires you to solve a little puzzle before each turn of the page. The art style is simple and geometric. The puzzles are also rather simple and geometric. The background music is peaceful and soothing.

Personally, I felt the story was a bit incomprehensible without any text to elaborate upon the images, and the puzzles were quite easy, though not always obvious, sort of like untying a knot or tracing a maze with a pencil. Some people like that sort of thing. I must be one of those people.

Overall, I found Zenge to be a relaxing, zen-like experience. I appreciate the artwork, the music is nice enough, and the puzzle mechanics are interesting. Though if you want to challenge your expert puzzle solving abilities, this probably isn't the game you're looking for. It only took me an hour and a half to finish, and I may not ever play it again, but it only costs a dollar, and in my opinion, it was worth it.

34060378.review:
[h1]是游戏，更是艺术[/h1]
近两年这种风格的游戏层出不穷，代表作《纪念碑谷》更是如雷贯耳。不同于《纪念碑谷》的低多边形（Low Poly），Zenge其实就是多边形拼图，或者说，是高级一点唯美一点的拼图。

BGM：★★★★ 没给满是因为就那么几首重复播放，略显单调
画面：★★★★ 宽屏无法满屏有点可惜，画质精美，感谢原画作者！
剧情：★★ 我是出了名的脑洞少女，没什么剧情我都能脑补很多然后产生一堆感想，然而对这款游戏并不适用。剧情偏意识流，零零碎碎看不明白，只能等通关后放ppt（没错我觉得那个就是ppt）的时候好好观赏一下。

总的来说，非常值得购买。我买的捆绑包喜+4，很值。

至于你问我剧情讲了啥，一千个人有一千种解读方法，不妨自己花点时间试试咯。

Zenge is a wonderful little game. The puzzles are not too difficult, but you have to think about what you're doing first and what will follow after that. 33906293.review:
[h1]Итак,что же такое Zenge?[/h1]
- Zenge это занимательная головоломка, повествующая историю Эона — одинокого путешественника, который застрял во времени и между мирами. 
- Zenge это интересная игра в которой игрокам предстоит собирать виртуальный пазл.
[b]Плюсы:[/b]
- Маленькая стоимость игры
- Приятный саундтрек
- Прекрасная атмосфера
- Продуманный Gameplay
- Красивая графика
- Наличие достижений Steam
- Возможность легко получит 100% достижений
- Большое количество карточек
- Увеличивающийся уровень сложности
- Шикарные картинки
- Большое количество уровней
- Игра развивает логику
- Минималистичный дизайн
- Очень красивая история
[b]Минусы:[/b]
- Игра слишком лёгкая
- Не поддерживает планшетный ввод на ПК,хотя игра и разрабатывалась под тач-девайсы
[b]Вывод:[/b]игра замечательно подходит для тех кто любит решать головоломки!

Потрясающая игра, отличное звуковое сопровождение, графическое оформление, а так же, внезапно, сюжет! Уровни все прекрасно оформлены, провёл в игре около двух часов, но надоесть она не успела, даже наоборот, было обидно, что всё так быстро закончилось. Пока не прошел последний уровень даже не подозревал о том, что в игре присутствует хоть какой-то сюжет, но напоследок был приятно удивлён интересной историей маленького человечка. Благодаря разнообразию способов (повороты, увеличение\уменшение и др.) играть было снова и снова интересно и некоторые уровни показались просто гениальными! 
Отличная игра для тех, кто хочет с удовольствием немного пошевелить извилинами и просто отдохнуть в свободное время! 9 огненных человечков из 10

33814093.review:
[i]I bought the Relaxing Puzzle Box on Summer Steam Sale.[/i]

Zenge is a simple game, which is good for relaxing. I'm more into challenging puzzle games, but I was curious because the minimalist art looked gorgeous. I haven't seen many logic games with great design yet.

[b]Summary:[/b]

Pros:
[list]
    [*]for those, who like minimalist art, it's nice
    [*]soundtrack is good
    [*]relaxing experience
    [*]cheap
[/list]

Cons:
[list]
    [*]there's only one goal in every level: sliding pieces to the correct place
[/list]

I don't recommend playing this game for people, who would buy it only for brain-training, because it can be boring if we don't count everything else.
The story of Eon is not so interesting in my opinion.

I wouldn't have bought this game, if it's not on sale. I'm not planning to beat it again.
[u]For the sale bundle price it worth a shot.[/u] This is an "okay" game to pass time. Playing it after a 2spooky4me game makes it better - great for calming your nerves. Plus there are trading cards and an achievement, which is good.

I'm not sure whether I should choose recommending it or not. It's between. I wouldn't tell my friends to buy it, but it's not that bad either. I'll go with thumbs up. The creators of the game definitely deserve it. They made a pleasant little experience, and I'm glad that I could be a part of Eon's world.

[i]Note:[/i] This is my first review. Apologies if I made some mistakes in English grammar.

33665195.review: I do like to take an occaisional step back to play casual puzzle games, however, I found myself impatiently looking to the menu to see how close I was to the end far too many times, which isn't a good sign. I wish I could rate neutral because I really wanted to like this game. The game has a nice piano track, even if it gets somewhat repetitive. As for the story told in the pictures, it seemed forced and nonsensical like it was trying too hard to be something its not. My biggest problem with the game a lack of challenge while completing the puzzles aside from the challenge of getting around the clunky click and drag controls where you're forced to click and drag every time the object changes direction instead of gliding down the tracks. This left me feeling impatient and I ended up less calm by the end of the game than I was going into it. The game isn't terrible, but its also not something I would recommend. :/

33650885.review:
It is a simple game that uses various elements such as move, rotate, paste, flip and teleport to match the pictures. The puzzle itself is modest, but the illustrations and music of the game are fantastic. As a gamer, I would like to recommend as a first game to my child in the future.

[h1]Pluses[/h1]
+ Easy and intuitive difficulty. This, of course, may be a minus at the same time. But one thing is certain that there is no puzzle-specific stress.
+ Think of it as a fairy tale with a puzzle. Perhaps if the illustrations were mediocre, this would be a big drawback.
+ It is a great blessing to be able to enjoy such illustrations and music at a price of 1$.

[h1]Minuses[/h1]
- It is ambiguous to say that it is a minus, but certainly the value of the puzzle game itself does not seem so valuable. It is a game used hands more than a brain.
- Playtime is very short, but considering price, illustrations and music, I am sorry to say that this is a disadvantage.
- For people who do not have interest in illustration appreciation, the value of the game falls sharply.

It’s a good game. It’s not that amazing, but it’s still good. The puzzles are not really difficult, but there are new mechanics introduced through the game that brings something interesting to it. The soundtrack is quite good and relaxing too.

33435380.review:
怎么说呢，我从游戏进行中途就开始纠结究竟是给好评还是差评，直到通关后决定给差评。

首先这并不是一个糟糕的游戏，游戏画面还是不错的，初玩的时候音乐和每关完成后的图片的确十分赏心悦目，但是在游戏进行到一半的时候我开始不由自主的产生了一种疲劳感，虽然游戏有在逐渐添加新的元素，但是基本套路都在意料之中，关卡繁多整体难度偏低，加上对鼠标并不算友好的操作，使得过关更多的变成一种体力而不是脑力活动。

另外就游戏类型和流程来说，音乐偏少而且耐听度欠佳，而且有几首的基调并不是那么轻松舒缓导致烦躁的心情进一步放大（我还遇到了音乐停止的bug，但居然发现那循环了好几次的音乐停止后反而舒服了一些），中后期的剧情图片感觉质量也没有开头时的高，整体剧情比较意识流，以至于最后基本只是抱着为了通关而通关的态度玩的。

这类小而简的游戏最核心的还是关卡设计，好的画面、音乐固然是加分项，但并不能掩盖核心上的缺失，很显然作者在这个游戏的关卡上更注重的是量而不是质，而本来并不算差音乐因为不足够支撑整个游戏的长度反而在后期起到了副作用，如果能加大一些难度并缩减三分之一的关卡，那这将是个十分不错的游戏。

Zenge is a competent puzzlegame with more than enough content to justify it's low price.
What I like about Zenge:
- It's cheap and concise.
- The puzzles are decent entertainment and the game doesn't drag on for too long.
- Finishing a puzzle rewards you with an art piece, most of these are relatively creative.
What I dislike about Zenge:
- The puzzles don't really have that much variety.
- The difficulty level is not very high, however the game doesn't get too boring because it's relatively short.
My nitpicks:
- The presentation isn't the most appealing, the puzzles are kind of an eye-sore to look at.

There is not much else I can say, if you like puzzle games, get this, it's about an hour long if you're okay with solving puzzles and it doesn't get too difficult, but it's a quick time passer if you need it.
Is it replayable? Not so much, however, you shouldn't really expect more for the miniscule price tag.

A very short but entertaining little game. The art style is what drew me towards it the most. It has this dream-like quality to it and combine with the music works very well. The story that unfolds is basically up to your imagination. What you see in the pictures after you finished the game is up to your own interpretation.

Personally I played this game when I was depressed and I have to say that for a brief moment I felt better playing it.

33143125.review:
I must admit, when I started this game, the first few puzzles I thought were way too easy (for too long), and I almost stopped playing.  The (minimal) story is what kept me going, and boy am I glad I did.  The puzzles can get very challenging, though every time a new mechanic is introduced, the game does a good job of easing you into it.  It was a very nice game (once I got past the first few puzzles), and I would reccomend it to people that like casual puzzles.  Thats pretty much all this game is: logic puzzles dealing with how to get all the pieces to their ending locations.

I didn't like all of the mechanics, as some wouldn't work very well in all cases.  It also wasn't always obvious if a piece would be able to slide into place, so a bit of trial and error was needed to figure that out.  However, I'm still very glad that I never got in a situation where I had to restart.  A few of the levels may potentially need a restart, but most, if not all,  are always possible to solve, no matter where you move the pieces.

STORY:
This game's story is told in pictures shown after evey successful completion of a level.  There isn't really much to it, but you follow this blue pawn eveywhere on his adventure with this doorway. No dialouge, no speech, no words at all, other than ZENGE and the credits, in the entire game.  There are lots of meanings one can put into the adventures by this pawn.  Part of the appeal for me is I was able to use my imagination to make my own story out of it.  Its akin to games like LIMBO for this reason

ART:
The entire game is puzzles and art.  Every time a new mechanic is introduced, art about it is shown.  Every time a level is completed, art is shown.  And puting all gameplay aside, the art is rather beautiful.  Simple, but well-defined, if you like art, you wil like the art in this game.  For a sampling you can look at some of the discussions abut the game.

GAMEPLAY:
The gameplay seems to be made more for mobile than for desktop.  Tap on a "symbol" to activate it.  Swipe a piece along the line.  Or drag over the line to select at which point to put the piece.  All of these work rather well, in most cases.  Sometimes, though, it won't do what is desired until you click the piece in the correct location.  Or maybe its just more than once.  I never really did figure it out.

MUSIC:
The music was good for this type of game.  pleasent to listen to, never too distracting.  It isn't too memorable, though about ten-ish puzzles before the end, the music seemed to just stop altogether.  I thought that fit with the story at that point ([spoiler]finally leaving the world instad of exploring, given mixed emotions, could very well lead to not wanting to leave[/spoiler]) but perhaps it was unintended.

OVERALL:
Minor gameplay issues aside, I think this is a wonderful game, well worth the less than $1 i paid for it.  I'd reccomend it for people that love puzzles, and like logical thinking, but don't want an impossile challenge.  Every puzzle was solvable in under 10 minutes; most under 3, a lot under 2 (there was one puzzle that had me stumped for a little over 6 minutes).

32800281.review:
Don't let this games high rating fool you, I'm not going to make assumptions about other reviews, but i cant help but feel like the high rating is from so many people thinking "Well... it was less than a dollar so ill give it a thumbs up"

The game is by no means a bad game. its totally fine. But that little thumb means if someone asked me if they should play Zenge, I'd be inclined to tell them to spend their time elsewhere.

ART: 
So the game consists of a series of puzzels that, when completed, reveil some artwork that is meant to reveil something about the "story". I see that this game has been tagged "minimalist". However I'd argue that the art is simply low effot/quality. To me, Zenge lacks the stylization and charm to be considerd minimalist. Rather it ends up giving the impression that the artist went with something they would have no trouble drawing a lot of. The art is very simplified, but it sure isnt minimalist.

MUSIC AND SOUND:
At first the music seems charming and relaxing, but even in the small amount that I played it, the music was starting to be very repetitive. There are very few tracks and they basiclly play on repeat thoughout the whole experience. Additionally, the sound effects of interacting with the puzzels themselves does not go well with the music at all. The SFX are very reminiscent of old web based flash games and I would not be supprised to find out they where simply downloaded from some an open source website.

THE PUZZELS:
Nothing much to say about them, honestly they do try to keep it fresh by introducing new mechanics every few puzzels, but makeing your puzzels more complex doesnt make them more challenging or more fun. Some might argue that it doesn't have to be challenging to be fun, but there is also nothing fun about zoning out and just sliding your mouse across a screen because the puzzels are so simple. Most people who want a PUZZLE game are hoping to find something, ya' know? Puzzeling? But Zenge falls totally flat in this area. The puzzels are so easy you'll take half a minute on each one at best. And that kinda of simplicity can't be pulled off without some impressive replayability. Of which Zenge has none.

All in all, I don't hate it. But in a vacum, I wouldn't suggest you play it.

32700828.review:
First off, I'd like to thank my friend who gifted the game to me, much appreciated!
Zenge takes a very old and simple concept (jigsaw puzzles) and presents its own unique spin. The meat of the gameplay is that you can perform different types of transformations on the pieces like rotation, mirroring and scaling. 
While I have not put in a lot of playing hours, I can tell that a lot of effort went into designing each puzzle, so that it works with the above-mentioned gameplay mechanic. The difficulty curve is quite nice, and the different gameplay gimmicks are introduced in a forgiving manner.
There are a few minor details that could have used more attention: For example, moving the pieces can be kinda of slow since it's proceeded by a short animation... This feels kind of unnatural, since each time you drag-and-drop a piece you have to consciously hold the mouse for half a second.
I don't want to nitpick too much, as this is an all-around decent game. Much love!

I'm not sure if I understood the story of this game, whether this is intentional or not, I somewhat enjoyed what I played. The game was simplistic and every solution felt right, that is to say, natural. None of the puzzles ever felt too confusing, though they were not always simple either. The puzzles also take a turn for the eaiser near the end as the story began to take the driver's seat. This was not unwelcome however, it was a nice way of slowing down the game for the ending.

TL;DR - Good game; won't cramp your brain, but isn't always obvious either. Fun mechanics, and a somewhat obtuse and/or abstract story. One of the more enjoyable casual puzzlers.

32339115.review:
Иногда необходимо отдохнуть от потных игр, расслабиться, и выйти на совершенный трансцендентный уровень.
Эта игра - как хорошая медитация. Сам саундтрек стоит куда больше, чем цена, которую выставил разработчик.

Музыка - непередаваемо чарующая, обладает своим глубоким "сакральным звучанием", и настраивает на вышеупомянутый трансцендентный уровень своей атмосферой. Полагаю, что всё дело именно в музыке, и разработчик принял воистину гениальное решение не испортив эту музыку самим геймплеем. Эта игра - идеальный подарок для интроверта, но сойдёт и как начинающее пособие для отшельника, решившего идти духовным путём в уединении, оставив цивилизацию позади.

Говорят, люди избегают одиночества потому, что оставаясь с самим собой не каждый наслаждается приятным собеседником.
Поэтому эта игра понравится не всем. Но если вы почувствовали небольшой отклик, читая этот отзыв, не исключено, что знакомство с ней оставит сугубо положительные впечатления.
Играть строго одному, иначе не настроиться на волну !

32036889.review:
Mixing jigsaw puzzles with rails, hooks and switches, Zenge manages to build an array of short, creative puzzles. It's clearly a mobile port with tap and slide controls and big buttons but that's negligible for the gameplay itself.

The level of complexity grows with the player learning the self-explanatory functionalities and conditions. That is part of why the game is so short, the puzzles are rather easy to grasp but still encouraging enough. Each level is quickly solved and rewards the player with a colourful picture and a light sparkling sound. On the other hand, thoughtless trial and error attempts are punished with a clunking noise and vibrating, red pieces, disturbing the mood.

Zenge is a visually and auditory pleasing game with relaxing chill-out music and slightly cheesy sea waves sounds. The graphics, i.e. the full pictures, are nice and clean with warm colours but nothing to get too excited about. The narrative about Eon consists of a series of pictures that is better described as a theme rather than a story.

With a maximum average of about 2 minutes to solve a puzzle, it's easy to just breeze through the 70 levels in one sitting. Recommended for every casual puzzler.

32025768.review:
[h1]스토리가 궁금하신 분들을 위해..[/h1]

사실 차분하고 몽환적인 배경음과 다르게 내용은 좀 암울합니다.

[spoiler] 방랑자 '이언'은 의문의 통로를 열기 위해서 3가지의 토템을 모으기 위한 끝없는 모험을 하게 됩니다. 처음엔 태양으로 향해 달려나가는 이언은 태양 중심부에서 핵을 발견하게 됩니다. 핵을 갖고 나와보니 어느 사막에 떨어져 있었고,  그 사막엔 신전이 존재했습니다. 

이언은 그 신전을 탐험하기 시작했으며, 신전의 꼭대기까지 올라가니 화이트 홀을 발견했고, 어떠한 곳으로 들어가게 됩니다. 화이트 홀에 들어가니 반대모양의 토템을 얻고, 빙하의 세계로 떨어지게 되지요. 근데 그걸 지켜보던 회화세계의 이언이 있었습니다...  

그렇게 이언은 빙하의 세계에서 열심히 노를 저으며 방랑을 하고 있었습니다만,갑자기 앞에 큰 빙하가 나타나서 앉아서 쉬는데 저 위로 얼음으로 이루어진 부유성이 보입니다.  저 부유성은 어떻게 가는거지? 하고 생각을 하며 빙하를 걷는데 알고봤더니 그 빙하는 크라켄의 몸. 크라켄이 부유성으로 날려줍니다.

그렇게 부유성에 도착한 이언은  의문의 상자를 발견하는데, 의문의 상자를 열어보니 포탈 모양의 토템을 얻게되면서 또 어디론가 끌려가게 됩니다. 블럭을 따라 길을 따라가보니, 이상한 건물이 하나 발견한 이언. 역시나 그 이상한 건물 속으로 들어가는데 우물을 발견합니다. 자기는 죽을 생각도 안하는지 빛나는 우물로 뛰어 내리니 점점 가라앉다가 이번에는 회전하는 토템을 발견 했습니다.


 그 토템이 이언을 이끈 곳은 미로... 미로를 걷다가 걷다가 끝이 안보이자, 지평선 너머로 태양을 보며 '내가 저 태양에서 핵을 가져왔었지...'생각 하게 됩니다. 그러자 그 핵이 조그만 생명체로 나타나 미로를 박살내고 다음 장소로 인도합니다.그 곳에는 크기를 변화시킬 수 있는 토템이 있는 곳이었습니다. 4가지 토템을 모으게 된 이언은 첫 장소로 지하철을 타고 가게 됩니다. 

첫 장소로 돌아온 이언은 회화세계를 갈 수 있는 통로를 열었고, 그 곳에서 또 다른 이언과 마주치게 됩니다. 회화세계 속에서 만난 이언은 미로에서 도와준 그 누군가와 함께 구름을 벗삼아 놀기도 하고, 달로 연을 날리고 있었는데, 주인공 이언을 발견하자 "어..어떻게  네가 여기있는거지?" 하면서 회화세계 속의 이언은  주인공을 회화세계에 가둬버리고, 회화세계 속 이언은 태양으로 피신을 하게 됩니다. 

시간이 지나고, 주인공 이언은 어떤 곳으로 이동이 되었으며, 회화세계 속의 이언에게 복수하기 위해 토템들을 다시 모으는 여정을 하게 됩니다.

여기서 맨 마지막장과 맨 첫째장이 비슷한 표지입니다. 무한반복하게 된다는 뜻이지요. 
 [/spoiler]

31982774.review:
[h1][b]Um quebra-cabeças relaxante, Zenge[/b][/h1]

[i]Zenge, um quebra-cabeças minimalista que capta a tua atenção rapidamente.[/i]

Zenge, é um jogo do tipo quebra-cabeças/puzzle minimalista e o objetivo do jogo é fazer esses puzzles para desbloquear imagens. O jogo ao longo de cada puzzle resolvido apresenta uma imagem a mostrar uma parte da história do personagem Eon.

[h1]Jogabilidade[/h1]

A jogabilidade do jogo é muito simples (só irás precisar do rato), terás que mover as peças por linhas pré-definidas e posiciona-las de maneira correta. Ao inicio será o básico do jogo, mas conforme avanças no jogo irá aparecer novos "comandos" nos puzzles como uma forma de aumentar a dificuldade dos mesmos, como [b]rodar a peça, transportar a peça de um sítio para o outro, virar a peça horizontalmente ou por cores para ativar outras linhas,[/b] mas nada demais. O jogo conta 70 níveis, níveis esses de pura descontração.

[h1]Conquistas[/h1]

O jogo apresenta apenas 1 conquista, a mesma é conseguida ao completar o jogo.

[h1]Arte do jogo[/h1]

Um dos pontos fortes do jogo se não o mais forte, a sua arte. Cada uma das 70 imagens apresentadas é muito bem desenhada e com um toque suave e minimalista tornando o jogo bonito e relaxante.

[h1]Conclusão[/h1]

Zenge apresenta uma proposta diferente do habitual, usando puzzles como manivela para uma história não muito perceptível de um personagem chamado Eon, contém uma boa jogabilidade e puzzles simples. A arte é o ponto forte do jogo e as imagens apresentadas ao longo dos puzzles resolvidos são em desenhadas e de boa qualidade. A dificuldade é pouca e os puzzles são fáceis de resolver mesmo contendo obstáculos durante o percurso do jogo. O preço é de 0,99€ (0,79€ em promoção), esteja ou não em promoção, o jogo é barato e vale a pena ser comprado.
Recomendo a compra do jogo para amantes de quebra-cabeças e/ou para quem gosta de ter uma experiência relaxante com jogos deste género.

[b]Se te ajudei, comenta e analisa a minha análise para ajudar o próximo e ficar entre as análises mais úteis e também ajudar a decidir essa pessoa a comprar o jogo ou não. Bom jogos![/b]

31975835.review:
Ein wunderschönes Puzzlespiel, das in einzelnen Bildern eine kleine Geschichte erzählt. Das Spielprinzip ist interessant und für mich ganz neu (wobei man sagen muss, dass ich wirklich selten Puzzle spiele). Man schiebt verschieden geformte Teile über vorgegebene Schienen, um sie an eine vorgegebene Position zu bringen. Dabei kommen nach und nach neue Mechanismen dazu, wie zB Drehen, Spiegeln oder das Zusammenfügen von Teilen zu einem neuen Teil.

Zenge hat 70 Level, die nach und nach schwerer/komplexer werden. Ich habe das Spiel nebenbei gespielt, bin also nicht konzentriert in einem Zug durchgerusht, und habe so etwas mehr als 5 Stunden mit puzzeln verbringen können. Untermalt ist das ganze mit einem atmosphärischen Klaviersoundtrack.

Zu diesem günstigen Preis ist Zenge meiner Meinung nach absolut empfehlenswert!

31952080.review:
Zenge ikst ein Puzzlespiel, in dem man Puzzleteile über vorgegeben "Schienen" an die richtige Stelle schieben muss. Das klingt simple, aber im Laufe des Spiels werden Elemente wie Teleportation, Drehen, Spiegeln und Dehnen/Schrumpfen der Puzzleteile sowie Farbcodierte Schienen, die erst durch bestimmte Puzzleteile aktiviert werden müssen, hinzugefügt. Das ganze wird untermalt mit langsamer, unaufdringlicher Musik.
Obwohl die Variationen durch das Drehen, Spioegeln etc. für Abwechslung sorgt, schafft es das Spiel nie, wirklich knifflig oder anspruchsvoll zu werden. Tatsächlich geht es eigentlich nur darum herauszufinden, in welcher Reihenfolge die Puzzleteile an ihren Platz - der zudem hervorgehoben ist - geschoben werden müssen. 
Wenn man ein kleines Puzzlespiel für zwischendurch sucht und sich bewusst ist, dass es ein kurzes Vergnügen wird, liegt man hier aber richtig, bei dem Preis ohnehin.

I quite enjoyed this one, it’s unique and although it only took up just under 2 hours for me (with a dinner break included in that) it was worth adding to the pile in my opinion.

It’s fairly relaxed and introduces quite a few different mechanics as you go along, which by the end are all incorporated.

The music did start to bug me a little after a bit, but there is an option to mute that so it wasn’t too big of a problem. 

It’s a good little brain teaser and it’s an easy 100%.

31931160.review:
Zenge ist ein Puzzle das sehr schön gestaltet ist.

Anfangs sind die einzelnen Puzzle noch recht einfach, entwickeln sich gegen Ende zu Kopfnüssen, die aber nicht schwer sind sondern einfach eine Herausforderung dar stellen. 

Während man im Spiel voran schreitet deckt man ein stimmungsvolles Bild nach dem anderen auf. Wärend die Bilder eine zusammenhengende Geschichte erzählen, wird diese durch passende und stimmige Musik untermalt, die die leicht melancholische Stimmung untermalen.

Für jeden der auch gerne einmal Kunstausstellungen besucht ist dieses Spiel ein absolutes muss für alle anderen die einfach mal mit dem Kopf aus dem Alltag aussteigen wollen ebenso. Auch für jeden anderen der Puzzlern etwas abgewinnen kann.

Für weniger als ein Euro ist Zenge jeden Cent wert. 
Einzig schade ist das man nach nicht mehr als 2 Stunden leider durch ist.

[u][b]Worth price[/b][/u]
It worths its price.

[h1]- Review below ----------------------------------------------------------------------[/h1]

[u][b]GRAPHICS[/b][/u]
Very nice graphics, and you got a nice picture after completing a level.

[u][b]SOUNDS[/b][/u]
With an ambiant music and some sounds, the game is relaxing.

[u][b]GAMEPLAY[/b][/u]

The first levels are really easy : you need to slide the pieces from nodes to nodes to their respective positions to reveal a nice picture.
After finishing several levels you'll unlock some new gameplay mechanics : merging parts, symetry axes, warping nodes, rotating nodes, shape reducing/increasing nodes, color tracks with switches.

As said earlier, the difficulty is between Casual and Puzzle-Gamer. The difficuylty is increasing but you'll have some easy and relaxing levels to let you learn some new gameplay mechanics.
The latest levels contains many mechanics and require more time and patience to solve them but are still short.

I would greatly recommend that game even if the game is short. We would ask for more in a new sequel !

31699881.review:
[h1]Résumé[/h1]

Zenge est un petit jeu de puzzle zen absolument charmant. Si le jeu est parfois un peu facile, il n'en reste pas moins un véritable incontournable pour quiconque aime les jeux de réflexion ou quiconque sait apprécier un jeu minimaliste à forte ambiance. Le seul point négatif de ce jeu est qu'il est très court (il est probablement possible de le finir en moins d'une heure), mais cela ne devrait absolument pas vous empêcher de vous jeter dessus, a fortiori au vu du prix.


[h1]Davantage de détails[/h1]

[b][u]L'ambiance[/u][/b]

Zenge est un jeu minimaliste qui va vous faire passer de puzzle en puzzle, dans une ambiance zen absolument adorable. Les dessins à la fin de chaque niveau sont vraiment superbes, et racontent une histoire qu'on a plaisir à suivre. Il est clair que le développeur a cherché à polir l'ambiance de ce jeu à l'extrême, et c'est probablement la première chose qui saute aux yeux du nouveau joueur. Plus qu'une ambiance, Zenge a de fait un véritable cachet qui pour moi le fait réellement sortir du lot et donne envie d'y revenir, même une fois le jeu terminé. Ce polissage s'est cependant peut-être fait au détriment de la difficulté des puzzles pour conserver un aspect "zen", ce qui peut être un défaut pour certains joueurs.


[b][u]Les puzzles[/u][/b]

Les puzzles présentent suffisamment de variété pour ne pas être ennuyants, ce qui est un petit exploit dans un jeu de réflexion reposant sur des mécaniques de jeu aussi simples. Et attention : j'ai bien dit [i]simples[/i], et non simplistes. Cette simplicité rend le jeu accessible pour tout le monde, sans pour autant donner l'impression que le joueur est pris pour un âne, et ce malgré la pourtant relativement faible difficulté des puzzles. Les mécaniques de jeu sont enrichies au fur et à mesure de l'avancement et ne deviennent jamais lassantes (ce qui est probablement aussi dû au fait que le jeu est assez court).

Comme je l'ai dit, la difficulté des puzzles reste faible, mais cela est probablement dû entre autres au fait que le développeur ne s'est pas amusé à rajouter de la difficulté de façon totalement artificielle comme cela peut être fait dans certains autres jeux de réflexion, par exemple en rajoutant des puzzles en contre-la-montre ou en introduisant une nouvelle mécanique de jeu dans un puzzle déjà complexe afin de casser un peu la courbe de progression avec un petit pallier. De ce point de vue, je ne peux personnellement que saluer la qualité du design du jeu, qui ne tombe pas dans le piège de chercher à artificiellement augmenter sa difficulté juste pour que les amateurs de casse-tête soient satisfaits.


[b][u]La durée de vie et le prix[/u][/b]

Ce jeu est malheureusement très court... et dans le même temps, a probablement exactement la bonne durée de vie. Zenge peut être fini en moins de 2h, en prenant très largement son temps, mais cette durée semble très bien dosée. Le jeu est suffisamment court pour que les mécaniques de jeu ne deviennent pas lassantes avant la fin. Le jeu est aussi assez bien rythmé : chaque fois qu'une mécanique de jeu commence à devenir lassante, une nouvelle est introduite, ce qui permet de garder un jeu qui reste intéressant pour toute sa durée de vie. De plus, l'ambiance donne envie d'y revenir plus tard.

À la limite, si ce jeu vous paraît trop court pour un jeu PC, il est aussi sorti sur mobile (et est d'ailleurs en promotions régulièrement sur GooglePlay). Sous sa forme mobile, Zenge paraît peut-être plus adapté que sous sa forme PC, étant donné que la plateforme se prête mieux à de courtes sessions de jeu.

Il est souvent difficile en matière de jeux vidéo de parler de durée de vie sans mentionner le prix... Ici, Zenge s'affiche sans honte avec un prix ridiculement faible, qui ne peut que "compenser" sa durée de vie. Si vous êtes du genre à vouloir avoir au moins une heure de jeu pour chaque euro/dollar investi, Zenge est un excellent choix. Si vous vous moquez de la durée du jeu tant que l'expérience est au rendez-vous, Zenge est aussi un excellent choix.

31545080.review:
[i]Реальность меркнет перед тем, что способно нарисовать воображение.[/i]

Что можно ожидать от игры стоящей 29 рублей и разработанной на движке «Unity»? Как правило – ничего хорошего. Подобных продуктов на Steam’е пруд-пруди и если их и покупают, то только на очень большой скидке и ради карточек. Да, все верно, добрый дядя Гейб готовит новое поколение бизнесменов, игроков на бирже и иных сквал… предпринимателей. Но вот ведь какое дело, наш сегодняшний гость, помимо дорогих карточек способен похвастаться интересным геймплеем, затыкающим за пояс серию «Zup!» Хм, звучит голословно? Ну что ж, давайте тогда взглянем на нашего гостя попристальней.

В основе геймплея лежит решение пазлов. Да те самые разрозненные кусочки мозаики, которые надо собрать вместе, дабы получилась очередная картинка. Вроде бы ничего особенного и подобные вещи можно купить в ближайшей союзпечати на радость сыну/внуку/племяннику, верно? Отчасти это и впрямь так, но лишь отчасти. По мере прохождения уровней растет сложность, и прибавляются новые игровые механики. Где-то надо понять какую из частей пазла телепортировать, а какую уменьшить, ну а где-то надо проложить маршрут таким образом, чтобы детали головоломки не мешали друг другу. Да, знаю, это все базовая механика, но затягивает, зараза. И пройдя один уровень хочется сыграть в следующий и так до тех пор пока игра не будет пройдена. Не обошлось и без награды. За прохождение уровней нам дают полюбоваться очередным кусочком истории, о которой мне хотелось бы поговорить чуть подробней.

Дорогие друзья, хорошо ли вы помните свое детство? Нет, не то самое, когда вы ходили в седьмой, а то и восьмой класс, дергали за косички соседку Валю, ну или наоборот лупили надоедливого мальчишку тетрадкой, а ранние годы – детский сад и 1-3 классы начальной школы. То самое время, когда благодаря лишь одному воображению можно было отправиться в столь удивительные и причудливые страны, что не способен представить ни один художник-авангардист. Уверен ответы будут совершенно разные и если же они будут отрицательными, то данная игра позволит вам вспомнить те далекие времена. Она повествует о маленьком мальчике, который жутко одинок, а потому грезит о местах, где никогда не был и вещах, которые он не до конца понимает. Солнце? Хм, а что там внутри? Наверняка же, что-то интересное. Замерзшая во льду игрушка? А вдруг она выберется и будет крайне сердита? Но главное – он грезит о друге, с которым можно было бы провести время. Во всяком случае, именно так мне видится сюжет данной игры. Возможно я страшно не прав, как знать. Но точный ответ смогут дать лишь сами разработчики, если захотят.

Итог? Достаточно увлекательный и качественно сделанный продукт, который стоит своих денег и оставляет по себе приятные впечатления после того, как скроются финальные титры. Всем кто хочет расслабиться и отдохнуть от «игр-тяжеловесов» рекомендую.

7 из 10 воздушных змеев

P.S. Спасибо большое [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/DiscaToFox] DiscaToFox[/url] за подарок.

31475480.review:
游戏难度不大，连起来是一个故事，一个关于游在宇宙间的行者的故事。

[i] 曾经的执念弄丢了自己，以至于怀念的那么没有真实感，与其说怀念，不如说在寻找答案，一个关于为什么活着的答案。[/i]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

食物给了身体以温暖，物质给了身体以愉悦，精神给了身体以意识。如果曾视为生命的如今变得不再那么重要了，朝夕相伴的身体也变成了束缚，那么什么才是我们继续下去的理由？

“我”——身高体型定义了“我”的相貌，容器内的“他”定义了思想与情感，随着那件事使得热情逐渐变冷，“他”终于走丢了。

他来到一扇门前，意为“真相”，门上立有三把锁，据说里面藏着所有问题的答案。门后是一条笔直的路，直的有点看不清旅途的长短。还好有两旁的树陪着他，陪她在漫漫长夜里学会忍耐与平静。就这样他走到山顶，登上了去往月球的梯子。

月亮的光照亮了夜里赶路的人，而在月球上没有了乌云的遮蔽也使得天空更加赤裸，在那里他第一次领略了宇宙的静谧与浩瀚，惊叹于自己的无知与渺小。可折射的热总会是少那么几层温度，他决意要去光的源头——太阳。

他坐上船来到了太阳的中心，那里没有任何生命，荒凉笼罩着整个地心，他只好提着来时的一盏灯，拖着疲惫的身体向灯塔走去。可这个被喻为“永恒”的灯塔竟然发不出光，原因没人知道，他诧异走上了灯塔中间的螺旋梯。还好靠着扶栏上火的引导，让他每走一圈都更接近于灯座，最后在天顶点亮了灯塔，找到了第一把钥匙——“正反之匙”。

随即灯塔射出一道光，点开了一个椭圆形的镜面，里面映出的是一个截然相反的城，也许那里藏着灯塔熄灭的线索，他这么想着。起初他划着船并没有理会只露出一角的冰山，但是冰山下的怪物并没有打算放过他。八爪鱼的追赶让他紧张，就在这绝望的时候，他竟然被触角拍打出的浪花送入了冰宫，找到了第二个钥匙——“无常之匙”

冰宫融化了，大地回暖，曾浸淫在白色雪皑下的地表也逐渐显露出来。不远处的绿洲上有座迷宫，他好奇的走了进去，盘根错节的弯转和死路搞得他晕头转向，不过在那里他遇见了一个喜欢看宫崎骏动画的小孩儿，事实上这个自发光的孩子想不让人注意也难，也许这就是天上派来的使者吧。小孩儿用自发的射线恫穿了墙壁，他终于找到了最后一把——”角度之匙“。

回程的路有些慢，他就坐在这架光子飞船的正中间思考着：
假如良善可被反转，假如因果也有虚伪，假如解法因人而异，那么我们还应该去执着什么呢？

[h1] 是你我、
是真假、
是聚散？
还是生死？[/h1]

最终他拿着三把钥匙打开了“真相”之门。

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[i] 原来哭的场景要用着笑，
原来纠结的心情适合说违心，
不想再拿得失锻炼身体，
我这个懂得太多的孤儿，
在这里做了个电台，把心情播报给自己，
好像晾晒旅行的纪念品，
然后从全世界路过，
最后在终点，等我也等你。[/i]

完整版链接：
[url=http://www.gimmgimm.com/article/info?id=11116]旅程从这一篇开始吧[/url]

31132882.review:
难度不高。推荐入手。然后讲讲你对这个的游戏剧情。
我的剧情：
[spoiler] 
===============第一章======================
1.你从地上爬起来。发现面前有一个门。你不知道为什么会出现在这里。你非常的惊慌。但你发现面前有一个门。或许这会指引我吧。
2.你没注意到门上面的符号，只一心想着怎么回去。所以就从门子的方向直走，并祈祷着这或许是正确的道路。
3.你发现了一个梯子，你的绝望一扫而空。你在庆幸自己走对了路，并顺着梯子爬了上去。
4.你爬上了月球。发现这个世界好美。
===============第二章======================
1.你爬上一块方块上。欣赏这美丽的世界时。方块动了，你发现他的目标是太阳。
2.脚下的方块聚集到了一起。你在思考为什么会这样。
3.你离太阳越来越近了。你在在想下一步怎么办。是跳下去还是留下了？
4.你没有跳下去。因为你害怕会因此死亡。但你脚下的方块不动了。
===============第三章======================
1.太阳忽然打开了，就像鸡蛋壳一样。“或许这中间就是我离开的路吧”你在这样思考着。
2.你一想到马上就可以回家了，这回家的欲望促使你勇敢的跳了下去。
3.你发现了一个大门，上面有你看不懂的符号。你觉得我要和这个美丽的世界说再见了。就恋恋不舍的走了进去。
4.你发现你没有被传送回家。而是在太阳的内部。你感觉命运就像在给你开玩笑。你根本就没有被传送回去。但你发现目前有一个像电池一样的东西。
===============第四章======================
1.你带着这个会发光的电池回到了自己的星球上。漫无目的的行走。祈祷着能快点找到回家挨的路。
2.在你祈祷了不知道多少次后，你的面前隐约出现了一个高塔。你以为是海市蜃楼。是自己想回去的欲望太强了。所以出现了幻觉。
3.你很怀疑自己的感觉，但这海市蜃楼也是自己现在唯一的出路。你缓缓走向了高塔。很意外，这不是海市蜃楼。这是真的高塔！你的内心又燃起了希望。
4.这塔很大。以至于我绕了半天才找到入口。
[/spoiler]

[b]总共用时3.2小时，哎，脑子是个好东西，真希望我有。[/b] 

1.[h1]自我感觉[/h1]    游戏通过拼图，来告诉你Eon的故事，我觉得故事应该是这个样子的，这个叫Eon的人是个时空旅行者，这不同的时空【星球】中旅行，从中认识了他的朋友【基友】在一起相识相知，可是最后还是一个人默默的离开，并有过尝试去寻找，确在也找不到，可能这就是生活，错过了，就没有了，只有自己得不到的，才会去怀念。可能作者就是用这种方式来诉说他的故事，每个人有每个人的故事，只希望找个对的人，去和他诉说。

2.[h1]游戏体验[/h1]    游戏好评原声音乐，[spoiler]用图片的方式来表达游戏故事，所以每个玩家自我体验到的故事会不一样[/spoiler]也正因如此，会让玩家看不懂，只能自己去猜，游戏拥有着喜加一的价格，可是在玩法上，更加的优良，游戏拥有集成式卡牌，可以挂出3张，喜欢卡牌的小伙伴可以尝试，整体来看游戏值得购买。

30827377.review:
Zenge commence comme un puzzle mâtiné de taquin avec ces pièces qui ne peuvent pas se chevaucher lors des déplacements puis très vite apparaissent d'autres possibilités : inversion, rotation, téléportation (m'a posé bien des ennuis celle-là, pas compris de suite les symboles alors que c'est tout bêtement cliquer au départ puis à l'arrivée, la honte^^), réduction, agrandissement, interrupteurs. Bien que les puzzles en eux-même soient simples et les possibilités de mouvement relativement claires, ces combinaisons d'action font que ce jeu ne tombe jamais dans la facilité ou l'automatisme. Zenge trouve le compromis idéal entre évidence et complexité. Avec son ambiance graphique et musicale très douce, ce jeu parvient à être relaxant tout en maintenant notre attention en éveil.

Une vraie réussite.

On pourrait regretter l'absence de score ou d'indication d'une solution optimale mais ce n'est pas vraiment gênant l'objet du jeu étant plus un parcours détente que la performance.

30781969.review:
不错的独立游戏
优点都让其他人说了，那么还是找点缺点吧
以下缺点都是游戏实实在在存在的，以防部分有朋友看了好评后冲动购买，结果发现不对胃口导致玩不下去
列出这么多缺点不代表不推荐，反而我是推荐的。
关卡太多是病，玩到后期很容易审美疲劳，再加上bgm就那几首循环，虽说画风唯美bgm动听但是还是会疲劳的。
剧情没给人一种念想让玩家有玩下去的冲动，我都是分了几周才断断续续通关的，中途有时候太腻了就真的玩不动了。
拿到成就后没觉得哪里有成就感，也许是因为太简单了，也许是因为剧情并没有让我得到释怀
游戏到后面个人认为谜题设计者有点做不下去了，后面的谜题都是通过线条和阻挡让屏幕乱成一团以增加难度，没有前面的几关谜题内容跟图片内容有关联的感觉（前面有一关是开锁还是什么的，就真的是让玩家把堆在一起的一个矩形还是圆形的方块们一个一个拖开，然后图片出现的一瞬间豁然开朗，视觉冲击很不错）
难也不是很难，大概定位为休闲游戏
但是这游戏事实上并不休闲，因为没有动力玩下去，审美也疲劳了怎么休闲？
以上。

30660158.review:
Ein kleines Spiel bei dem es einzig darum geht Bausteine so zu verschieben, dass sie an dem richtigen Ort sind.

Klingt einfach? Ist es auch!
Zumindest am Anfang lässt einen das Spiel immer wieder einfache Aufgaben lösen, welche die Elemente erklärt, steigert sich jedoch im Laufe der Zeit immer weiter.

Ohne zuviel vornweg nehmen zu wollen, es gibt viele verschiedene Elemente, wie drehen, rotieren, teleportieren und noch einige weitere, diese jedoch sind die am häufigsten benötigten!
Der Sinn ist es die Bausteine in der richtigen Position an dem Ort zu haben, wobei sie sich gegenseitig behindern können und auch 100% passen müssen, ein kleiner Ecken an der falschen Stelle geht nicht, am Ende entsteht so immer ein Kunstwerk, welches einem eine Bildergeschichte erzählt, ohne Dialog und ohne Vertonung, nur mit einer dezenten Musik unterlegt die nicht vom Spiel ablenkt.

Fazit:


Für den Preis von 1 € oder im Sale lohnt es sich, ich habe 1 1/2h gebraucht um es durchzuspielen, was ich schon ausreichend finde. Die Errungenschaft ist sehr einfach zu bekommen, und Sammelkarten gibt es auch, also kann man sie für etwas Geld notfalls auch verkaufen(kein Gewinn zu erwarten ;) ).

30651343.review:
Zenge is a lovely little puzzler, all about fitting pieces together and slotting them into the right-shaped spaces on the screen.   similar in playstyle to Hook, the order in which you place the pieces means that you may not be able to place others, so you might have to backtrack to find a different order.

The game is very soft and warming.  It's kind of like a warm cup of cocoa, while wrapped in a snuggly blanket on a summer's evening.    The levels take anywhere from 5 seconds to 4 minutes to finish, and there's around 60 of them, I think, so it takes three or so hours to play, perhaps a little more if you're not so great at imaging how things look when rotated or flipped.

The pieces can all move around on a track, and when you click them together, you can pick up more pieces and move them about.  As you play through the game, a wordless story unfolds of a little guy searching for the pieces to help with the puzzle.  Each frame of the story is told between each level, and follows the little guy as he reaches for the moon, then uses stepping stones to head towards the sun, find its key, unlock it, and by taking the essence of the sun, to work wonderful magics, search parallel universes, and collect the various operators which help you move bits around the board.  they're rotators. flippers, shrinkers, teleporters and various coloured pads which unlock some moves which might not be previously possible.

The background music is lovely, and just tinkles away in the backgound, giving the game it's lovely ambient air.  The art style is lovely too, with gradual fade-ins for the story frames , and how the pieces you're fitting together make those frames.    

The feedback when you make bad moves is very good, and in a subtle way makes you more careful.. in the same way that you know if you spill your cocoa, you're going to have to get up and find a wipey to clean up, which is far too much hassle, so better to just take it slow and relax...

End to end I really enjoyed this game. It's got heart and soul baked into it.  It's not hard, and very seldom does it throw you a level which needs more than a few minutes of playing about..  there were two which required you to fit some pieces together in a specific place, although other places should have worked just as well, but they're not too frequent.

Very well worth my time, and I feel very relaxed and like I've experienced a lovely fantasy tale too.

30491044.review:
Редкий в последнее время пример маленькой дешёвой игры, автор которой не склепал чучело на Clickteam Fusion, рассчитывая на «Пипл карточки и ачивки схавает», а выжал из концепции максимум, нужный для подобной игры.

Суть – под приятную музыку собирать приятные минималистичные картинки, через которые подаётся местное подобие истории, если это хотя бы на подобие истории тянет. Механика проста, но постоянно усложняется различными деталями. Сначала это стандартный паззл по сбору картинки из частей. Затем механика начинает напоминать этакий сбор бумажной коробочки, а под конец превращается в сложный на вид, но простой внутри клубок, который увлечённо распутываешь. Головоломки требуют на подумать 5-10 минут, сложность держится на уровне, но и не плавит мозг. Собираемые картинки радуют глаз, а музыка не раздражает, но и удручающей тишины нет. За свою цену – категорически рекомендуется.

Zenge作为一个解谜游戏，玩法比较独特，有一定的挑战性。这就是它唯一的优点了。

缺点：
游戏性
1.拖动拼图时不能直接转弯，必须要放开鼠标再拖，碰到那种一大堆拐弯的就得有足够的耐心。
2.拼图变换时响应时间比较长，变换时的动画都像是在浪费时间。

游戏风格
1.音乐难听，音效也难听，气氛压抑单调。
2.配色不好看，大部分是太阳落山的颜色，或者是灰色。
3.意义不明的剧情。

综上，游戏体验比较糟糕，游戏节奏太慢，操作不顺畅，音乐难听，并没有其他的评测说的那样好。一个致郁的游戏却打着“放松”的标签，这是什么道理？开发者确实做的很用心，但是和Hook，klocki比起来，我还是喜欢后二者。

30445490.review:
[h1][b]Simples e belo![/b][/h1]

Zenge é um game puramente casual e minimalista, desenvolvido de maneira independente pela desenvolvedora Michal Pawlowski, sendo distribuído pela Hamster On Coke Games. Lançado em abril de 2016, para PC e Android. 

Zenge tem uma proposta extremamente simples, resolver pequenos puzzles para liberar belas imagens, é como montar um quebra cabeça de fato, porém com um toque minimalista. A jogabilidade é simples e funcional, basicamente temos que mover as peças por linhas pré-definidas e posiciona-las de maneira correta, o interessante é que há uma sequencia de posicionamento, pois não basta colocar uma peça no lugar certo, mas sim coloca-las na sequencia correta. Os primeiros puzzles são bem simples, sendo resolvidos em poucos segundos, mas conforme o jogador avança novos elementos são inseridos, como a necessidade de rotacionar, espelhar e até mesmo transferir peças de um ponto a outro. Isso dá um ar de complexidade aos quebra cabeças, mas nada que afete significativamente a dificuldade do jogo, uma vez que o mesmo pode ser finalizado em menos de duas horas.

O grande atrativo de Zenge é sua direção artística, cada novo puzzle resolvido revela uma bela arte, que são simples em sua essência, mas impressionam pela sua beleza e profundidade e é interessante notar que há certa narrativa ocorrendo através da arte, mostrando um pequeno personagem explorando mundos desconhecidos, porém tal narrativa é bem enigmática, pois não deixa claro qual a sua mensagem no final do jogo.

A trilha sonora é agradável e relaxante, não tornando-se enjoativa em nenhum momento, casando perfeitamente com a proposta do game. 

Zenge é um bom jogo, apresentando uma jogabilidade simples e funcional, com belíssimas imagens que instigam o jogador a continuar jogando. Indicadíssimo para os fãs de jogos casuais e minimalistas. 

[b]Informações adicionais:[/b]
Nota geral: 7,0.
Tempo dedicado ao game: 2 horas.
Conquistas desbloqueadas: 01 de 01.
Dificuldade: Fácil.
Fica a dica: Tão simples que nem precisa de dica.
Imagens durante a jogatina: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/luishq/screenshots/?appid=17410&sort=newestfirst&browsefilter=myfiles&view=imagewall]Clique aqui.[/url]
Vale o preço? É tão barato, que vale compra-lo com ou sem desconto!
Modo de jogo: Exclusivamente Singleplayer.
Idioma: Não há diálogos ou textos a serem traduzidos!
Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tAVkEckIMR4&t=0s
[i]Deixo um agradecimento especial ao amigo Bonjony, que me presenteou com o jogo.[/i]

[b]Publicado originalmente no [url=http://portohq.blogspot.com.br/2016/05/analise-games-mirrors-edge.html] Blog PortoHQ.[/url][/b]

Worth the $0.99.

Au départ, j'étais séptique. Il faut dire que les petits puzzle game sur Steam, on en a vite fait le tour. Mais Zenge n'a rien à voir avec ces jeux. J'ai été transporté par la musique, le gameplay m'a donné des frissons et l'histoire est grandiose.
Bref, les mots me manquent pour décrire ce jeu, digne successeur de la longue lignée de jeux créés par Gaben : Half Life. Je suis fier d'avoir pu assister à sa création, et j'y reviendrais sûrement un jour pour faire jouer mes enfants.

Prenez le. Ce n'est pas un jeu, c'est un sac rempli d'émotions et de souvenirs, c'est une révolution du jeu vidéo, c'est une expérience indescriptible. J'en reste sans voix....merci....

29985689.review:
★强烈推荐
真的真的很棒的一款游戏

1.它不是单纯的极简风格的小游戏，它同时也在讲述一件冒险的故事，蛮值得细细品味的。

2.如果说hook是在拆线，klocki是在接线，那zenge就是拼图

3.整体游戏时间比不长稍微长一点，近100min

4.BGM也超棒的

5.玩的游戏里面拼的图其实与拼好之后呈现的属于故事的图片里面物品的形状毫无关联，但每一大关多出来的玩法， 就是故事中那一阶段要追寻的东西，给人一种代入感。

6.我觉得有一个地方可以做得更好的，就每次拼完图显示图片后，下一关的按钮能过个1-2s再出来（这样能截图x

7.通关还有个成就，多棒XD

8.语无伦次，不会说话请见谅XD

29896976.review:
Zenge ist ein sehr schönes Schieberätselspiel. Der Schwierigkeitsgrad fängt leicht an und steigert sich. Rätselprofis können sich zuerst unterfordert fühlen, da es nicht zu den härtesten Rätselnüssen gehört. 
Anfangs muß man nur verschieben, später kommen neue Elemente hinzu wie Teile verbinden, spiegeln oder teleportieren.
Level können nicht übersprungen werden, aber man kann zum Wiederholen Level einzeln auswählen. 
Die Atmosphäre mit der dazu passenden Musik ist wirklich gelungen, wenn ein Level geschafft ist, verwandelt er sich in ein Bild. 

[u]Fazit[/u]
Tolles atmosphäriches Rätselspiel das sehr viel Spass macht.
Die bezahlten 0,79€ haben sich gelohnt.

29798465.review:
关于Zenge
这款游戏的画风就深深地吸引了我，再小清新又华丽的艺术风格与极简主义的结合下，这款游戏充分展现其魅力
解密不算难，2小时通关但是它的过关后的画面却让我觉得很赞，简单的人物，华丽的场景，都是它吸引我的地方。
背景故事若隐若现，有点像以撒的叙事手法，通过一个个碎片拼凑成故事，朦胧又赋予人想象的空间。
70关解密，难度不高却很有意思。
基本算是我玩过的最棒的解密游戏之一了
9.5/10
+小清新与华丽结合与解密极简的画风
+有点深度的背景故事
+不算太难但有意思的解密

-太少了玩了不过瘾
-[spoiler]看什么看赶紧去买！[/spoiler]

29730279.review:
This is a fun, casual puzzle game where you must move and manipulate shapes into specific outlines on the screen. A picture is revealed when you are done, and you go to the next level. The game introduces additional mechanics over time, such as the ability to rotate, flip, and teleport shapes.

None of the puzzles are particularly difficult, but they are challenging enough for casual gaming. The graphics and music are minimalist, although I found the music to be repetitive. I had to mute it halfway through the game.

With 70 levels to play, you'll get about one or two hours of gameplay. For a dollar, it's definitely worth the price if you like casual puzzle games.

29695820.review: 可以静下心来玩的游戏，玩的过程中总让我想起纪念碑谷。好吧，我玩纪念碑谷花的比这款游戏多，而且他们的玩法有很大不同，但是他们可以被归于一类游戏。虽然它并不很难，但是它以某种更加含蓄的方式讲了一个完整的故事，故事本身并不复杂，但发掘故事，拼凑故事才是这款游戏要你做的。

29689960.review:
这是一个讲述科学和文明的故事！

最初人类探索科学，征服地球和月球，最终指指太阳。

擅自拿取了太阳的核心，以至于世界陷入永夜，人类发现了自己的自大导致的错误，于是寻找恢复太阳的方法，找回了科学所需的三颗心：专一、服务、传承。期间在遇到大的困难的时候，受到先人的帮助！之后溶于自然，回归科学。

与宇宙的使者、太阳的化身交流反思，太阳的化身打开回归之门，人类回到因自己陷入黑暗的世界，在无助绝望之极，太阳的化身重新幻化为太阳，给那个世界带来光明。

许多许多年之后，人类又重蹈这个错误，不过这次太阳是否还会重生！？

29687883.review:
•Zenge - замечательная головолмка с не менее замечательным звуковым сопровождением. При прохождении данной игры вы попадете совершенно в другой мир, в котором вы будете посещать загадочные, мистические и удивительные места. В самом начале вам не покажется игра тяжёлой, способной затянуть вас на пару часов, но при дальнейшем прохождении вы поймёте, что это не так. 

Каждый уровень уникален по своему, где-то прийдётся вертеть фигурами так, как никогда прежде, двигать их взад и вперёд не понимая, что вы делаете не так. В самом деле игра очень увлекательная, она с радостью пополнит запас моих любимых игр. 

Отрисовка уровней, приятная анимация и музыка, хороший подход художников к отрисовке локаций, это все вас ждёт в данном шедевре. На самом деле я бы отдал большую сумму для этой игры, но раз она настолько дешёвая, это несомненный плюс данной игры.

  •Хочу выразить ОГРОМНУЮ благодарность польским разработчикам за эту игру.

Играйте, развивайте мышление, наслаждайтесь атмосферой ♦♦♦

29662337.review:
《Zenge》
非常不错的小品，从游戏有移动版本就能看出其本身的量级真的不大，甚至可以当做是一款益智软件······
音效和配乐都很不错，但可惜BGM的数量有些少，如果再丰富一些会更好。
画面还算精致，画风很清新、漂亮。
玩法类似于七巧板和华容道的结合，融合了一些其他的元素，不算太难，通关也是很容易。
一共70关，每一关完成之后的图画连在一起是一个小故事，故事内容没太理解，但已经到了宇宙的范畴：）估计很有哲学性吧，，每个玩家都可以自己去体会一下，解读一下。
一瓶饮料的价格，就能买到2~3小时的脑力活动和游戏体验，外加一段浮想联翩的小故事~~~可以说很是推荐——
不只是简单的 +1 哦！

Zenge un petit jeux puzzle basé sur la réfléction. Un petit jeu détente avec musique calme en fond. Idéal quand on peux pas joué longtemps. A chaque fin de puzzle vous debloqué un tableau qui conte une petite histoire. Au fil des niveaux vous débloquerez plusieurs outils, et des couleurs ce qui compliqueront les tableaux suivants. Un casse tete plutôt facile mais qui demande de la réflexion. Trés agréable.

Compté environ 2 H de jeux.

29510281.review:
Quando pensiamo a un puzzle game, di solito pensiamo a enigmi complessi, cervellotici, che a volte possono anche essere frustranti.

Ma Zenge non è di questa categoria. O meglio, è un puzzle game ma di quelli rilassanti, non cervellotici e riflessivi. Il gioco, inizialmente uscito su mobile, consiste nel spostare pezzi attraverso degli ingegnosi meccanismi per comporre un'immagine. 
Le immagini (accompagnate da una deliziosa musica di sottofondo) così composte a poco a poco racconteranno la storia del protagonista Eon e del suo viaggio.

Il gioco costa quanto una busta di patatine, meno di un euro ed è consigliato se vi piacciono i puzzle game e volete rilassarvi. Così non ingrassate.

Difetti? L'unico difetto che ha è la sua breve durata, ahimé si finisce in 1-2 ore ma per quel che costa, vale.

通关后把所有拼出的图所讲述的事连在一起，就是一个关于一个小人（Eon）通过某些类似于传送门的东西来回穿梭旅行的故事[strike]个人见解[/strike][spoiler]结尾点题，好作文[/spoiler]
BGM大赞！让人非常轻松愉快。
总体来说：  9.5/10
游戏也不贵，非常推荐入手+1的说。

Nachdem David Hain in seinen Videos mehrfach von Indie-Games geschwärmt hat habe ich auch mal hier reingeschnuppert und habe mich für dieses Spiel entschieden, da es gut wirkte und einen guten Preis besitzt.
Das Spiel an sich bietet eine ruhige Atmosphäre, die durch sehr schöne Musik geschaffen wird, die ca. 70 Level sind sehr abwechslungsreich durch die ganzen verschiedensten Elemente, wie zum Beispiel durch das spiegeln von Teilchen. 
Der einzige Aspekt, bei den ich eine Änderung gutheißen würde wäre, dass man in das Spiel implantiert, dass man die Bilder, die man erpuzzelt hat auch herunterladen kann, da diese einfach so toll aussehen.
Schlussendlich kann ich sagen, dass es mit ca. 90 min Spielzeit ein sehr schönes Spiel ist, welches man mal einen Nachmittag spielen kann und ich kann es einfach jeden empfehlen, auch denen, die eher Spiele des anderen Ufers spielen.

Il gioco è un gioco rompicapo semplice ed intuitivo.
Mi è piaciuta la modalità di gioco piuttosto originale, ma è soprattutto l'atmosfera ciò che ho apprezzato.
La grafica è pulita e molto curata. Molto bella la storia raccontata attraverso immagini, rivelate ad ogni livello.
La musica di contorno, rilassante, completa il tutto, rendendo il gioco piacevole e coinvolgente.

Il livello di difficoltà è piuttosto basso, e in tutta onestà lo sconsiglierei agli appassionati di rompicapo che cercano sfide. È piuttosto un gioco per passare il tempo senza grosso impegno o sforzo.
La giocabilità è scarsa, intorno alle due ore. Questà è l'unica pecca che ho da segnalare.

29368942.review:
How to write a review without spoiling anything, hmm.... By keeping it simple I suppose

Puzzles- simple but very unique and intuative, not quite impossible but certainly challenging and enough to get your brain whirring like a top.

Story- also simple but at the same time quite profound and open to individual interpretation... For me it had a very intense spiritual feel.

Graphics and art- (yes everything is simple), but at the same time quite pretty in its own surrealistic respect.

Music- a lovely somewhat-changing loop that created a soothing zen feeling to the entire game. Rarely have I ever played a puzzle game that I did not ragequit or get angry at. I managed to beat it in one sitting which is new for me.

This game, while simple in all respects, leaves all to the player to interpret and enjoy. It is a work of art to say the least, and I'm quite surprised to have been so satisfied by something so... Mediocre from the first impression. "Don't judge a book by it's cover" is a valid statement here

I'll definitely be coming back to this game when I need a cooldown from my usual rough-n-tumble mix.

(the added touch support is also great)

Эта головоломка весьма не сложная, но очень интересная, уровни проходить не в напряг, действительно расслабляюще. Отдельно хочу выделить музыку - она в игре шикарна и обеспечивает погружение. Также вполне приятный визуальный стиль, что несомненно радует глаз) 
При прохождении каждого уровня открывается новая картинка, и пройдя всё, мы получаем неплохое слайд-шоу с небольшим, но всё же сюжетом, которое было посмотреть целиком как-то даже трогательно и мило, что ли.

Simplistic graphics and soothing colors makes this a pretty little game. After each level, you're shown a pretty picture. Together they form a somewhat coherent story. This game tells a story through pictures about a figure traveling through different lands. You basically solve a puzzle that then forms a picture which is a piece to the story. Annndd that's about it. 

The puzzles aren't that hard. And even when it gets more intricate with new functions; the solutions always seems to be quite obvious. So new tools are being introduced but the game is still easy and relaxing. 

I bought this game because I thought the graphics were really pretty for $1 game and I wasn't disappointed. The pictures are wallpaper material in my opinion and the music just adds on to the peaceful atmosphere. The game design is cute, simple and just helps calm the mood. 

If you are looking for a complex puzzle game, zenge isn't what I would recommend. This game is just for anyone who wants a break and wants to play something soothing, easy and beautiful.

29098529.review:
Despite the short runtime I'm happy to recommend this game for three reasons:
Gameplay wise for its ability to introduce new mechanics and ways of making them interact with each other.
Aesthethics wise for the really neat minimal art that made me wish for a collection of them without the game graphic to use them as wallpapers and relaxing sound design/music.
Story wise for its ability to tell a cute sweet story through the pictures shown at the end of each puzzle with the nice minimalist drawings already mentioned, making you want to progress more not only for the satisfaction of resolving the puzzle itself, but also to see what happens to the little dude next. 
Really well done, congratulations to the developers for this little gem.

29095741.review:
Puzzle game molto rilassante, con una peculiare delicatezza sia nello stile artistico che nel comparto audio. 
E' composto da 70 livelli che non presentano un altissimo livello di sfida, anzi, sembrano impostati in modo da rilassare la mente più che per creare situazioni veramente cervellotiche; questo fa sì che il gioco non si presenti mai come un'esperienza frustrante, diventando inoltre completabile in un paio d'ore o meno.

Nel corso dei vari livelli vengono aggiunte man mano nuove meccaniche, sempre intuitive e di semplice utilizzo. E' vero che proseguendo i livelli diventano leggermente più complessi, tuttavia la difficoltà complessiva rimane sempre medio/bassa: non si va a toccare nemmeno lontanamente il senso di frustrazione.

Dopo aver risolto ogni piccolo puzzle ci apparirà come ricompensa un disegno - curato ma volutamente non troppo dettagliato - che servirà ad evocare la trama (elemento molto in sottofondo) più che a raccontarla. Sono molto carini da vedere e conferiscono al gioco un'atmosfera un po' fiabesca.

Le musiche, seppur dopo poco si ripetano, le ho trovate davvero belle - forse anche a causa del mio debole per i pezzi suonati al pianoforte. Ad un certo punto ho disattivato anche i suoni per poter sentire solo la musica, trovando così il tutto ancora più piacevole da giocare.

In conclusione, se siete in cerca di grandi sfide di logica potreste rimaner delusi; se invece cercate un puzzle game leggero, contornato da belle musiche e da un'atmosfera rilassante, Zenge vi piacerà sicuramente.

Music didn't get too repetitive in the quick play time.
Storyboards are cutesy and any story is kinda hard to follow, but that's just flavoring anyway.

Excellent for what it is. Easy puzzle game that doesn't bombard you with scores or anything unnecessary.

28977768.review:
Otro de esos juegos minimalistas que tan buenos ratos nos harán pasar, en este caso recuerda bastante a Hook y similares, utilizando la herramienta gráfica Unity.

Si habeís jugado a Hook, Zenge os recordará a este. Se trata de resolver puzzles moviendo piezas para conectarlas en un dibujo final. Al principio es básico moviéndolas sobre railes, y a medida que completamos los niveles irán apareciendo elementos nuevos que complican el proceso, como giros, volteos de piezas y rutas sólo abiertas de otras formas, así en una buenas cantidad de niveles que en ningún momento resulta pesado. El juego puede completarse en un par de horas más o menos, si aplicamos concentración al mismo.

A través de las imágenes desplegadas se va desentrañando una pequeña historia visual de un pequeño personaje que ha salido de su mundo y quiere volver a él, y tiene que enfrentarse a diversos peligros a lo largo de su travesía, una interesante forma de ver cada una de las imágenes, las ilustraciones son bonitas, agradables a la vista llenas de diversas tonalidades y efectos así como temática.

En el aspecto sonoro tenemos melodías tranquilas y agradables que aportan un toque más al ambiente minimalista del juego, ayudan en la resolución de los puzzles. Los sonidos van en esa misma línea.

Entretenido juego de puzzles, para pasar ratos muertos resolviendo puzzles, se parece a otros de similar corte, pero por el precio que tiene es muy recomendable.

NOTA Indie 7´5/10

28966016.review:
总体来说是个好游戏

1、性价比不错，虽然整体游戏市场不会超过2小时，但是价格几元，也很合理了
2、游戏的配乐和插画很不错，对一个独立游戏来说很难能可贵了
3、难度上来说确实如和多人吐槽的一样不算难，可能作者本身是怕太难导致大家失去乐趣吧，想得太周到了，或者是感觉低估了大家的智商，或者是自己没想好怎么平衡难度
4、剧情上因为插画太写意了，所以可能会十个人眼里有十个哈姆雷特，我感觉我看到的是一个爱情故事，一个傻男子不停的追逐自己的梦想，一个女子在身后默默的跟随着……

推荐大家闲暇时玩玩。

28883604.review:
따뜻하고 포근하지만 간혹 섬짓한 느낌이 드는 동화같은 느낌의 퍼즐게임이다.
계속 해 봐야 하긴 하지만 나름 지금까지 해 봤던 퍼즐게임중 최고였다.

하지만 막상 싼값이라 부담없이 구매했기 때문에 별 생각도, 기대도 없었다.
아기자기하고 따뜻한 색의 파스텔톤 색감과 상점에 올라와 있는 영상이  마음에 들어 구매했을 뿐이었다.
일단 게임을 실행시키자마자 퍼즐만 덜렁 나오고 그 것 외에는 아무 것 도 없다.

정말 말 그대로 '아무 것 도' 없다.

그저 되게 단순하고 쉬운 퍼즐 몇 조각만이 덜렁. 이게 뭔가, 하다가도 눌러보고 옮겨보고 하다보니 대충 요령이 생겼다.
뒤로 갈 수록 퍼즐이 조금 난잡해지지만 여전히 아무런 설명이 없다.
퍼즐 하나를 클리어 할 때 마다 일러스트가 나오고, 그게 끝이었다. 그 어떤 글자, 알파벳, 숫자하나 안 나온다.
보고 들을 수 있는 거라고는 클리어 할 수록 난잡해지는 블록들과 잔잔하고 고요하지만 조금은 웅장한 느낌의 브금정도.

집중력때문에 퍼즐게임을 오래 못 하는 사람으로서 한 번 켜서 한 시간 넘게 붇들고 있었던 적은 처음이었다. 시간가는 줄 몰랐다.
막상 눈 앞에 흩어져 있는 퍼즐조각들을 보면 이게 대체 뭔가 싶지만 하나 둘 움직여보고, 맞추고, 결국 완성하고 나면 '이렇게 단순한데 그 난리를 쳤던거야?' 라는 자괴감도 간혹 몰려와 자존심이 상할 때 도 있지만 나름 만족스럽게 플레이중

사람마다 취향따라 다르겠지만, 일단 할인 할 때 한 번 사 놓고 심심하거나 정신놓고 싶을 때, 혹은 힐링하고 싶을 때 하기 좋은 것 같다.
퍼즐을 다 맞추면 나오는 그림과 대사하나 없지만 이어지는 이야기가 참 흥미롭다.
나름 그 몽롱한 음악과 동화 삽화같은 그림들 감상하고 모으는 재미라고 봐도 무방 할 것 같다.
